attributes.action: ensure all social service departments are controlled by central government
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is as a result of:
baby P in Haringey
Essex County Council failing to provide my disabled friends and I with a statutory Transition Plan at year 9
Social services in Edinburgh taking two children into care, despite both parents being fit and healthy

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
